conclusion: To measure the performance of a certain vehicle, a computer was used to depict the x-t (position-time) graph of the vehicle during a certain phase.
The graph shows a linear relationship between x/t and t, starting at 10 on the x/t axis.

premise: The graph shows a linear relationship between x/t and t, starting at 10 on the x/t axis.
conclusion: It can be seen from the graph that x/t = 10 + 5 × t.
According to the displacement formula x = v₀ × t + 1/2 × a × t², we can derive x/t = v₀ + 1/2 × a × t.

premise: x/t = 10 + 5 × t and x/t = v₀ + 1/2 × a × t
conclusion: From this, we can conclude that 1/2 × a = 5 m/s².
